title: 10 Years gift
body: I haven't received the 10 years gift you were giving for playing, Are you going to give them yet? Or  Didn't I enter into gifts requirement?

replies.body: Lew's insight is spot on!  Gifts are still being rolled out per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), and they won't all be received at once.  Hang tight!
The [gifts ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)are being sent out in waves and all eligible accounts should have them by 9/23.
